backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, SOS snapshots, meetup locations, and access-controlled CRUD/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to their respective short functional descriptions.
Manual smoke‑test checklist for verifying flyer download, sharing, and error handling flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base layers, color variables, theming, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the root React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all routes, layouts, and initialization logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when users attempt to access pages without required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that checks admin role and displays loading or access‑denied UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Shows a login card if no Internet Identity is present; otherwise renders its children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic retries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, optional authenticated sidebar, mobile menu, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Renders navigation buttons based on current route and user role, including admin and emergency lookup links.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the top header with branding, share button, optional emergency lookup link, and login button.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, viewing, rotating, and copying an emergency access code tied to the user's principal.
Lets users submit next-of-kin and medical info, requiring an existing emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and create one.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Provides UI for uploading license and ID files, validates them, tracks upload progress, and displays verification status.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Renders a stylized flyer preview with branding, app description, and share URL.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Dialog for generating, copying, and sharing the app’s public share URL, with options to view or download a flyer.
frontend/src/components/sos/LastKnownLoc: Displays the user’s last recorded SOS location with timestamp, coordinates, and a Google Maps link.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Shows emergency contact info and optional health details along with last known SOS location for first responders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management via React context using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that generates a QR code on a canvas with abort, timeout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, verification, and admin data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes and custom component classes.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Clipboard copy utility with secure-context checks and DOM fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty placeholder file for DOM-to-PNG logic.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file type and size and provides a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Manually renders a flyer element to a canvas and exports it as a PNG image.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Fetches the user's current GPS coordinates with error handling for geolocation failures.
frontend/src/lib/meetupShareCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears an 8‑character meetup share code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place categories to labels and provides option lists and label lookup.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Validates and safely converts text to a Dfinity Principal.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Empty placeholder file for QR-related logic.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a standards-based QR code generator with Galois field math and Reed-Solomon error correction.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Exports a function to download a canvas element as a PNG file with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Provides a Web Share API helper with clipboard fallback and detailed status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app’s canonical share URL using window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts dates to bigint timestamps and formats them for display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Utilities for getting and clearing URL parameters in both query and hash routing modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page for authenticated users to create and submit a new place entry.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a new route with waypoints and scheduled time.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for managing user profiles, verification reviews, and SOS location data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Provides a form for entering a driver's principal ID and access code, then fetches and displays emergency profile or SOS data. Handles validation, loading, and error states for first-responder access.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates, previews, copies, and downloads a shareable flyer image using a share URL, supporting auto‑export via URL params. Manages export state and user notifications.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the public landing page with feature highlights and redirects authenticated users to the places list. Includes navigation to the emergency lookup page.
frontend/src/pages/MeetupPage.tsx: Allows users to share and periodically update their meetup location with a share code, and lets others look up a driver's latest shared location. Handles validation, geolocation, mutations, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details for a selected place, including category, description, location, and submitter. Redirects to the places list if the place is not found.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists safe places with category filtering and text search, and allows authenticated users to add new places. Displays loading and empty states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders the authenticated user profile page, loading the user profile and displaying profile info along with verification and emergency setup cards.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Provides a placeholder route detail view with a back button to the routes list.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays the user's routes and allows searching routes by principal, with tabs for 'My Routes' and 'Search Routes' and navigation to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Shows the user's SOS emergency card, loading emergency data and falling back to profile setup guidance if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Lets users capture a one-time SOS location snapshot and navigate to view their SOS card, with warnings and status handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation using both URL query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container-queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing feature definitions, and pending requests. Describes current app requirements, versions, and project configuration details.
